CLI is your friend

If you just want CLI and don't care for the cgi bin you can use:

./configure --disable-all --disable-cgi --enable-pdo --with-pdo-sqlite=shared

and you're all set.

You will need to load pdo_sqlite.so in your php.ini or use dl();

You mentioned fixing this for 5.1, but this is still the case for 5.2RC's.

So, nothing can be done for that?

Tweaks

I found I had to also create a symlink to mysql_config:

ln -s /path/to/mysql_config /usr/bin/mysql_config

(I got that tip from <a href='http://www.spiration.co.uk/post/1332'>here</a>

Cheers.
